mapper.select: SELECT `r`.`role_name` FROM `user` `u` LEFT JOIN `user_role_relation` `urr` ON u.`user_id` = `urr`.`user_role_relation_user` LEFT JOIN `role` r ON `urr`.`user_role_relation_role` = `r`.`role_id` WHERE `user_name` = #{userName}

SELECT `p`.`permission_name` FROM `user` `u` LEFT JOIN `user_role_relation` `urr` ON u.`user_id` = `urr`.`user_role_relation_user` LEFT JOIN `role_perm_relation` `rpr` ON `urr`.`user_role_relation_role` = `rpr`.`role_perm_relation_role` LEFT JOIN `permission` `p` ON `rpr`.`role_perm_relation_perm` = `p`.`permission_id` WHERE `user_name` = #{userName}
